crossReport.ds: select b.pro_no, b.pro_name, b.ord, sum(KPI_VALUE) value, c.kpi_code, c.kpi_desc from dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m t, dmcode_province b, dmcode_kpi_lib c where t.prov_id = b.pro_no and month_id = '201102' and c.kpi_code in ('A0001', 'A0002','A0003', 'A0004', 'A0005','A0006') and c.kpi_code = t.kpi_code group by b.pro_no, b.pro_name,b.ord, c.kpi_code, c.kpi_desc order by c.kpi_code,b.ord

ext-config.sql: select b.city_no, b.city_desc, b.ord, sum(KPI_VALUE) value, c.kpi_code, c.kpi_desc from dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m t, dmcode_city b, dmcode_kpi_lib c where t.area_no = b.city_no and month_id = '201102' and t.prov_id = '${pro_no}' and c.kpi_code in ('A0001', 'A0002','A0003', 'A0004', 'A0005','A0006') and c.kpi_code = t.kpi_code group by b.city_no, b.city_desc, b.ord, c.kpi_code, c.kpi_desc order by c.kpi_code,b.ord
